meanings.definition: A room where tools are stored and maintained.
meanings.sent1: In the toolrooms, all the hammers and screwdrivers are neatly arranged on shelves.
meanings.sent2: My dad spent the weekend cleaning out the toolrooms in the garage.
meanings.sent3: The toolrooms were so organized that even the smallest nails had their own special spot.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a cluttered toolrooms, full of useful ideas waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The smell of oil and metal in the toolrooms always made him feel at home.

meanings.definition: The act of organizing or managing a room where tools are kept.
meanings.sent1: Proper toolrooms involve labeling each tool for easy access.
meanings.sent2: She excelled in toolrooms, making sure everything was in its place.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with toolrooms organization reached new heights when he color-coded the wrenches.
meanings.sent4: The toolrooms of her mind were in chaos, with thoughts scattered like loose screws.
meanings.sent5: The precision required for toolrooms management was a skill he honed over the years.
